items.title: Global Leaders Convene for Climate Summit in Paris
items.byline: By Lisa Friedman and Brad Plumer
items.abstract: Delegates from over 190 countries gathered to negotiate binding emissions targets ahead of the 2030 deadline.

items.title: Federal Reserve Signals Pause on Interest Rate Cuts
items.abstract: The central bank indicated it would hold rates steady as inflation remains above its 2% target.

items.title: SpaceX Successfully Launches Crew to Lunar Gateway Station
items.abstract: Four astronauts began their journey to the orbiting lunar outpost, marking a milestone in the Artemis program.

items.title: New York City Unveils Ambitious Plan to Redesign Fifth Avenue
items.abstract: The proposal would widen sidewalks and add protected bike lanes along the iconic Midtown corridor.

items.title: Supreme Court to Hear Challenge to Social Media Age Verification Laws
items.abstract: The case could set precedent for how states regulate minors' access to online platforms.
